page.title: 04Sunday in N.Wingfield
page.content: On Sundays my family stays in bed late except for my mother.She gets up earlier and puts the meat in the oven for the Sunday dinner.We don't always have breakfast but if we do,cereal or toast is enough.About this time,my sister's boyfriend comes to the house.My sister always asks how long dinner will be and my mum says something like"two foot six".I usually help my mum with the washing and ironing and she also hoovers up and polishes.At 2.30 my dad comes home from work and we have dinner.Sometimes we have home made wine with our dinner.After a big dinner we do some gardening,sunbathe or go to a friend's house.At night we watch T.V.and go to bed. Lisa Godfrey aged 11
